message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable product that holds significant value for your business. I understand its worth to you is $1500000, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1250000. This price allows you to secure a substantial advantage while ensuring a fair return on my investment. Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents a unique opportunity. If you decline, I'll be selling it to another buyer for a lower price.
